channel.title: Rona Ambrose

item.title: Mentioned by Spruce Grove Examiner
item.description:
Ambrose ready for new role as health minister
Edmonton - Spruce Grove MP Rona Ambrose was named the federal government's new health minister by Prime Minister Stephen Harper on July 15. Previously the Minister of Public Works and Government Services as well as Minister for the Status of ...

item.title: Mentioned by BlackburnNews.com
item.description:
Conservative MP Pushes Health Minister For Bee-Kill Action
Bruce-Grey-Owen Sound MP Larry Miller says governments and bureaucracy can sometimes delay or slow down the process. He's encouraging the new federal Health Minister – Rona Ambrose – to move as quickly as possible on the re-evaluation of the ...

item.title: Mentioned by Huffington Post Canada
item.description:
Cabinet Shuffle 2013: Where Alberta MPs Ended Up In Harper's New Inner Circle
